segments.text: The kitchen's layout is straightforward, with cabinets and counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman facing away from the mess she's making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on full blast, sink overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is nasty, spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in it, apron and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on the stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar's right there in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture screams trouble—the stool's tilting back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by holding out her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's cute mischief, but so risky on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage and a potential fall—what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR
